title: First State National Historical Park: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes        Historic bell tower. NPS       There are no fees to visit First State National Historical Park. Some partner sites may charge fees for some services. For more information about our partner sites, please visit Places to Go.  Interagency Passes  First State National Historical Park does not sell interagency passes, but they may be purchased online and at fee-based parks.       Fee Free Days Though First State National Historical Park doesn't charge fees, other National Park Sites do. To encourage Americans to explore our country's natural beauty, rich history and culture, all National Park Service sites that charge an entrance fee will offer free admission to everyone on these free entrance days.
